name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build: npm run build-css & npm run build-js & npm run build-js-prod & wait
scripts.build-css: npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/index.css --output ./data/css/index.min.css --minify & npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/diagnostics.css --output ./data/css/diagnostics.min.css --minify & npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/settings.css --output ./data/css/settings.min.css --minify & npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/setup.css --output ./data/css/setup.min.css --minify & npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/404.css --output ./data/css/404.min.css --minify & wait
scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-alpine & npm run build-js-common & npm run build-js-pages & wait
scripts.build-js-prod: npm run build-js-alpine & npm run build-js-common-prod & npm run build-js-pages-prod & wait
scripts.build-js-pages: node esbuild.config.js index & node esbuild.config.js settings & node esbuild.config.js device & node esbuild.config.js wifi & node esbuild.config.js setup & node esbuild.config.js diagnostics & node esbuild.config.js 404 & wait
scripts.build-js-pages-prod: node esbuild.config.js indexProd & node esbuild.config.js settingsProd & node esbuild.config.js deviceProd & node esbuild.config.js wifiProd & node esbuild.config.js setupProd & node esbuild.config.js diagnosticsProd & node esbuild.config.js 404Prod & wait
scripts.watch-js: npm run build-js-pages && node esbuild.config.js index --watch & node esbuild.config.js settings --watch & node esbuild.config.js device --watch & node esbuild.config.js wifi --watch & node esbuild.config.js diagnostics --watch & node esbuild.config.js 404 --watch & node esbuild.config.js common --watch
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
